website_summaries.verdict: A premium car alarm system that comes with more advanced security options than other systems.
pros: Entire kit includes an LCD starter remote and glass mounted reception antenna for better control
Horn offers better volume when alarm is activated and triggered
Programmable for one or two users
cons: Kit may require professional installation on some older cars or more advanced systems

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I've had prestige alarms and cant recall being this dissatisfied: 1. The siren is very weak; 2. The remotes did not work initially and required technical attention for it to function properly; 3. The remote with the monitor came with a battery installed in addition to a spare battery which is unusual and gave me the impression that the system was used. In addition, having the battery installed prior to connecting the alarm posed the risk of damaging the unit due to leakage from the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can remote start my car from inside Six flags with my car being parked in the back the mile range is true. (MUST HAVE FULL BATTERY)
customer_reviews.author: St Jock

customer_reviews.title: One if not the best alarm system on the market
customer_reviews.text: One if not the best alarm system on the market, was recomended to me by an electrical technician and i would recomend it to anyone, not problem with any of the features, what they preach is what they delivered 100%
customer_reviews.author: conrad Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good for price but stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Good- Works well Very sensitive and responsive Bot advertised range but pretty far in my opinion LCD remote definitely is the biggest perk Bad- Stopped working in about a year and 4 months and on few occasions doors wouldn't lock fully Would recommend for price but beware of life span
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm
customer_reviews.text: Great alarm, good range, you just have to replace the battery it came with if you have any range issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: LCD remote key chain flimsy easy to get lost
customer_reviews.text: My issue is the LCD remote key chain broke shortly after i got it and remote got lost. Cost $60 To replace almost 1/2 the price of the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Worrell

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: Is perfect good quality this is for professional installation only I think bcs my car has push star bottom
customer_reviews.author: claudio

customer_reviews.title: Item Came Faulty
customer_reviews.text: Item came faulty only thing that worked was the arm and disarm feature, spoke to Amazon rep, asked me to ship back but i am based in the Caribbean and it was more expensive to ship back than to get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Donnavan Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Just FIVE MONTHS later, mine no longer works.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, only FIVE MONTHS later, mine no longer works. The mechanic says the antenna has gone bad. He also says it's not the first one that he has has this experience with. I will see what Amazon can do about this and update accordingly..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok.
customer_reviews.text: Ok system. Not the best. Will try a viper system if I had to install again. Used on 2010 Camry with flcan bypass
customer_reviews.author: M. Mohiuddin

customer_reviews.title: Best Product out there
customer_reviews.text: I've been installing this product for over two decades and this system keeps getting better. Best deal for your money hands down.
customer_reviews.author: NEVARDO T.

customer_reviews.title: Remote very delicate
customer_reviews.text: Remote start acting up turns off and on on me and everything else work the alarm is good very sensitive but horns low would nice if it was louder.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product, highly recommend... You can close your eyes and buy...won't regret it!!!
customer_reviews.author: PFC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect alarm. Better than most expensive alarms
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing but good things to say about this alarm system... . I have 4 different vehicles and all my other vehicles have expensive alarms and none of them work as good as this alarm... The long-range is truly long-range. I can start or arm my car from a few blocks away with no problems... . None of my expensive alarms can do that... . Had it installed by a professional and they did a great job...
customer_reviews.author: E.S

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and scratched remote LCD screen
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what happened, but it looks like the factory box was only sealed and taped once. When I opened it to check the contents I found the two-way remote having scratches on the plastic screen almost like it was used and a damaged blacked out part on the LCD screen. I returned it s I cannot comment on its function. Maybe it was packaged poorly as there was no clear protector on that screen but I figured it shouldn't have been handled that roughly to cause that many scratches and damaged the LCD portion
customer_reviews.author: Sheephead Slayer

customer_reviews.title: Not Stealing my Van
customer_reviews.text: This has everything you need, power door locks, keyless entry. Engine emobilizer, Bump it alarm is perfect, Don't buy all the extra goodies Ya don't need em. Well it's been almost a year and BURNT Out At,110$ for the alarm system ya think it would last more than a year. Am starting to contact seller. Will let you know what they say about the system.
customer_reviews.author: Chappy Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent alarm, the only one that I see is ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent alarm, the only one that I see is that the battery runs out very fast and is unconfigured every time on the keychain, otherwise it is very good already installed.
customer_reviews.author: Franklyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: had it for a year with no problems works great
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good system but do not integrate in car security system. Need to carry two remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: head ache to install
customer_reviews.text: well it is in my 1994 chevy truck and works fine still a few kinks to work out wish I had better info on how to install in my particular vehicle other than that its alright
customer_reviews.author: James provence

customer_reviews.title: Which I highly recommended doing.
customer_reviews.text: Awsome!!! Hat it professionally installed. Which I highly recommended doing.
customer_reviews.author: Donny Chilla

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this. Installed, programmed, good to go! EXCEPT! Button presses register 50% of the time at best; range is approx 100 ft in clear, plain sight of the antenna; lost all programming today, reprogrammed and it's working again. Then, an hour later, it stopped sending look/unlock signals! This is over 4 days! I'm done, returning it and getting a viper that I know works
customer_reviews.author: MeDammit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I enjoy the added convenience of a secure heated vehicle
customer_reviews.author: Dascion

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Got the alarm with a defective antenna. Otherwise it works but I'm not impressed with their quality control.
customer_reviews.author: DJAY

customer_reviews.title: WORST ALARM EVER ***DONT BUY* **
customer_reviews.text: This car alarm worked for about 1 month and then it was terrible. It won't even unlock or lock the doors when you're 10 feet away from the car. Might as well just use your key.also it won't even let the car heater work when it remote starts and yes it is hooked up right. I know there's always someone that has a negative review but I'm serious don't buy this alarm/remote start it's terrible
customer_reviews.author: TEEJ

customer_reviews.title: To difficult
customer_reviews.text: Needs to meet any extras for most vehicles if it works with yours then it's not that bad
customer_reviews.author: SW1

customer_reviews.title: Not loud
customer_reviews.text: We had to go through the horn. The alarm is very quiet. After foing through the horn it was more noticeable. I dont care for the bad tou really have to lock it three times to make the pad go into effect. You have to do the same to have all doors and hatch to unlock. I rather one hit unlock and one hit lock. Overall it's good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tobianoluv

customer_reviews.title: #car toys
customer_reviews.text: So Cartoys will charge you 700$ for installing a 100$ remote start and alarm equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... this alarm defective and Amazon customer service was not good..
customer_reviews.text: I received this alarm defective and Amazon customer service was not good..
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, i bought this model and it was way to much to work and way to many relays to install. And after i installed it the remotes only worked from about 20 feet away. Wouldnt buy this brand ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Prestige APS997Z Two-Way LCD Command Confirming Remote Start/Keyless Entry and Security System with up to 1 Mile Operating Range + Magnet
product_meta.description: Single or double press to start Selectable run times 24 hour time start mode Cold temperature start mode Two or four hour automatic start mode Parking meter count down timer mode on LCD transmitter Additional count down timer mode Remote panic in all modes Improved custom code override, user selectable and programmable Protected valet Seven function LED - arm / disarm / zone 1 / zone 2 / zone 3 / valet / arming Intrusion alert with memory Additional engine immobilizer output, (optional relay required) Last door arming Multi tone siren Car horn output for additional alarm response Additional negative trigger input (hood and trunk) On-board relay for flashing parking lights Dual stage shock sensor (pre-detect, full trigger and in.city mode in.) Audible arm, disarm, defect and tamper chirp indications Headlight control output Illuminated entry control output Selectable active or passive arming Programmable auto lock on / off Programmable auto unlock / off / drivers door / all doors Selectable door lock pulse timing 1 second / 3.5 seconds / 1 secL / ddl. u/l Programmable active or passive door locks Remote trunk release Remote keyless entry Multiple vehicle capable Hybrid vehicle compatible for remote start Telematics port -carlink ready DBI port - plug in flash logic by - pass capable Limited lifetime warranty
feature_bullets: Five Button 2-Way LCD Confirming Transmitter | (1) Five Button 1-Way Transmitter
FlashLogic FLCART Compatible | Glass Mount Antenna with Built-in LED Light and Valet Switch
Programmed transmitter notification | Single or two user programmable with separate control outputs
Selectable run times | 24 hour time start mode | Cold temperature start mode
Parking meter count down timer mode on LCD transmitter | Remote panic in all modes
